text: Maung Maung Lwin (; born 18 June 1995) is a Burmese footballer who plays as a winger for Lamphun Warriors in Thailand and is the captain of the Myanmar national team. == Football career == Maung Maung Lwin started his career with Hantharwady United in 2014. In 2017, he moved to Yangon United. He helped the team win the Myanmar National League and the MFF Charity Cup in 2018. Maung also played in the AFC Cup. In 2019, he scored a winning goal against Hà Nội. In the 2020 AFC Cup qualifiers, he scored one goal and gave three assists against Indera. In 2021, Maung joined Lamphun Warriors in Thailand. In his first season, he helped the team win the Thai League 2. Maung became the first Burmese footballer to win a trophy in Thailand. == International matches == Maung Maung Lwin made his debut for Myanmar in 2015 against Lebanon. His first goal was against Hong Kong in 2016. In 2019, he scored a goal and gave an assist in a win against Tajikistan during the World Cup qualifiers. Maung scored two goals against Singapore in the 2022 AFF Championship. He also scored a free kick goal against Philippines in 2024. In 2025, Maung scored the only goal for ASEAN All-Stars in a 1–0 win against Manchester United in the Maybank Challenge Cup. == Player statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club team and year Club team Year Apps Goals Assists Hantharwady United 2014 21 2 5 Hantharwady United 2015 22 2 4 Hantharwady United 2016 22 7 3 Hantharwady United 2017 22 3 0 Total Total 87 14 12 Appearances and goals by club team and year Club team Year Apps Goals Assists Yangon United 2018 28 12 6 Yangon United 2019 30 11 1 Yangon United 2020 14 4 7 Total Total 72 27 14 Appearances and goals by club team and year Club team Year Apps Goals Assists Lamphun Warriors 2021–2022 18 4 7 2022–2023 25 3 4 2023–2024 17 2 1 Total 60 9 12 ===International=== Myanmar national team Myanmar national team Myanmar national team Myanmar national team 2015 1 0 0 2016 12 1 3 2017 9 1 0 2018 10 1 1 2019 8 1 3 2021 11 2 0 2022 4 3 0 2023 11 1 3 Total 66 10 10 Goals by opponent Opponent Goals 2 2 2 1 1 1 1 Total 10 === International goals === :Scores and results list Myanmar's goal tally first.
